ygData.subject: Groups
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, how about: 1: Monk 2: Monk 3: Monk 4: Monk 5: Monk 6: Monk Thats 12 fists a flyin... Attack a casting MOB and it d be funny to see it try and get off a
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, how about:

1: Monk
2: Monk
3: Monk
4: Monk
5: Monk
6: Monk

Thats 12 fists a flyin... Attack a casting MOB and it'd
be funny to see it try and get off a spell. Around
level 20 when you got eagle strike and your double
attack gets past 100 youd be doing avg (low) 40 points
of damage per round per monk, thats 240 points of
damage a round. Sheesh!
